title: November!
author: JGray
text:
Hidden Name: Dampflok

Wow, has it been a busy year. I can't believe it is November already. There's been a lot going on in the real world for me and things seem to be getting busier as we move towards the end of the year, thanks to the holidays.

So, what do you want for Christmas (or your selected mid-winter festival of choice)?

See you Thursday!

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: For christmas? How about a festive picture of Mandrake?
